Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for levels of detail.

NameEntry.Name: LOD: Depths / Undead Burg / Undead Parish
LOD: Catacombs / Tomb of the Giants / Great Hollow
LOD: Blighttown / Demon Ruins / Lost Izalith
LOD: New Londo Ruins / Valley of Drakes
LOD: Kiln of the First Flame / Northern Undead Asylum

lv01_BorderDist.Wiki: The boundary distance between LOD level 0 to level 1. In metres.

lv01_PlayDist.Wiki: The play distance (at the centre of the boundary) between LOD level 0 to level 1. In metres.

lv12_BorderDist.Wiki: The boundary distance between LOD level 1 to level 2. In metres.

lv12_PlayDist.Wiki: The play distance (at the centre of the boundary) between LOD level 1 to level 2. In metres.
